page.title: 03B.M.X.CHAMPION
page.content: My main interest is{B.M.X.Bikes.}I am a ten year old girl. I have over one hundred trophies. I started because my two older brothers were interested. I have to wear a helmet with a face guard and gloves and knee and elbow pads. I buy my equipment at Mousehole near Penzance. I went to Derby in 1984 and came fourth in the{British Championships.} A starter gets the riders ready by saying "Set-em-up. Riders ready. Pedals ready. Go!" There has to be a person trained in first aid at events. Some events are jumping events.There are quite a lot of jumps such as camel tops, step ups, speed jumps and whoops! In June,1985 I travelled to Birmingham. It was my first{National} and I came first. I am going to Derby and Birmingham later this year.
